traits.Feed on Death: When a creature within 30 feet of the kraul drops to 0 hit points, the kraul or another creature of its choice within 30 feet of it gains 5 (1d10) temporary hit points, provided the kraul isn't incapacitated.
traits.Hive Mind: The kraul is immune to the charmed and frightened conditions while within 30 feet of at least one other kraul.
traits.Pack Tactics: The kraul has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kraul's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
traits.Spider Climb: The kraul can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
